name: Tron Legacy Style
description:
Trained on SD1.5 using screencaps from the Tron Legacy movie.

There are currently two styles to pick from. Both work well, but style B should focus more on the light strips present in the clothes and buildings.

modelVersions.name: Style-TronLegacy-12v-v2
modelVersions.description: Retrained on different screencaps of the movie. It does certain things better, but not so much with others. Just another embedding to try to get a nice Tron mood.

modelVersions.name: Tron Legacy Style B, version 1
modelVersions.description:
As this is a textual inversion, it entirely depends on your model to create tron-like scenes. Adding things like sci-fi, cyberpunk, glowing clothes, skintight and so on might help.

Depending on the model, it might get stuck trying to do grayscale pictures, add negative prompts like monochrome, grayscale, black and white photo to it.

If you model hasn't seen anything from tron, it still might work. At the very least you should get similar lighting and glowing details.
